Name.description: The model name of the car

Transmission.description: The type of transmission the car uses

value_dict.Automatic: The car has an automatic transmission
value_dict.Manual: The car has a manual transmission

Engine Type.description: The type of engine the car has

value_dict.CNG: The car runs on compressed natural gas (CNG)
value_dict.Hybrid: The car is a hybrid, meaning it can run on more than one type of fuel
value_dict.LPG: The car runs on liquefied petroleum gas (LPG)

Engine Capacity(CC).description: The capacity of the car engine in cubic centimeters (CC)

Mileage(kms).description: The total distance that the car has traveled in kilometers (kms)

City.description: The city where the car is located

Year.description: The manufacturing year of the car

Price.description: The price of the car in local currency

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in used car pricing.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the specifications and features of a used car, please predict its price.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted price of the used car is.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in used car valuation.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the characteristics and condition of a used car, please predict its manufacturing year.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted manufacturing year of the used car is.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in automotive evaluation.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the specifications and features of a used car, please predict its mileage.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted mileage of the used car in kilometers is.
